channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJIFILM Business Innovation Corp. -- Driver Distributor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJIFILM Business Innovation Corp. -- Driver Distributor

item.title: CVE-2022-43460|2024-08-03T13:32:58.857Z -- fujifilm%20business%20innovation%20corp. -- driver%20distributor
item.description: Driver Distributor v2.2.3.1 and earlier contains a vulnerability where passwords are stored in a recoverable format. If an attacker obtains a configuration file of Driver Distributor, the encrypted administrator's credentials may be decrypted.
